title: Champion: A Story of the Happy Life of Roman Lefthanded Losinski
description: The novel Champion by Miles Cobbett has proven itself to be a heartwarming contender in the competitive market of American fiction.It's the story of a work-toughened Alaskan laborer and his life-changing decision to enter the world of professional boxing. Using simple yet powerful writing style Cobbett takes the reader along on the exciting journey of a lifetime.Scroll up and capture this amazing story with just one clickWhen you finish Champion #1 get ready for Champion #2 Watch for this exciting New Release
author: Miles Cobbett
